strapiPost.title: AcreTrader Makes Forbes' Top 500 List Of Best Startup Employers
strapiPost.content:
AcreTrader was listed on Forbes' 5th annual list of America's Best Startup Employers, which evaluates US-based businesses with at least 50 employees on three criteria: employer reputation, employee satisfaction, and growth.

  • State champs: AcreTrader was the only Arkansas company to make the top 500, listed at 488. Their inclusion on the Forbes list is a testament to their commitment to engaging, inspiring, and supporting their employees.
  • For farmers: Based out of Fayetteville, AcreTrader simplifies land investment through their online platform, and they work closely with farmers to improve their livelihood.

Learn more about investing with AcreTrader HERE.
